name: Metropolis 65
description:
This is a small project designed to re-create the open world flying level in Superman 64.

The map extraction was done by wackomedia here: https://wackomedia.itch.io/super-human-6-for-vr and I did some light scripting/optimization on the resulting data.

Features:

  • Flying around metropolis
  • Simulated Traffic
  • Shader switch (normal -> toon)
  • Fog removal
  • Powers (freeze breath, lazer eye beams, super speed)
  • Flying ring collection!

Controls (Mouse and Keyboard only):

[TAB] = Options

Ground Controls

Mouse = look

Space = Jump

WASD = Move

F = Start flying

Z = Super speed

Q = Super powers

Flying Controls

W = Speed Up (when moving)/ Up (when stationary in air)

S = Slow Down (when moving)/ Down (when stationary in air)

F = Stop/Start Flying when in air/Land when close to ground

Q = Super powers (when stationary)

Mouse = Change flying direction

Power Controls

Mouse Button 1 = Eye Lazers

Mouse Button 2 = Freeze Breath

All rights to superman belong to Siegel/Shuster/DC Comics
